columns.Description: Date and time when the record was generated
columns.Name: Timestamp

columns.Description: Cloud enviorment source of the cloud audit event. Cloud be Azure, AWS, GCP, AliCloud or other
columns.Name: AuditSource

columns.Description: Data source of the cloud audit event. Could be Azure ARM Logs, AWS CloudTrail, GCP Logging or other
columns.Name: DataSource

columns.Description: Type of activity that triggered the event
columns.Name: ActionType

columns.Description: Audit event operation name as appeared in the raw event columns. Usually includes both resource type and operation
columns.Name: OperationName

columns.Description: An identifier for the Azure cloud resource as found by Microsoft Defender for Cloud.
columns.Name: AzureResourceId

columns.Description: An identifier for the Aws cloud resource as found by Microsoft Defender for Cloud.
columns.Name: AwsResourceName

columns.Description: An identifier for the Google cloud resource as found by Microsoft Defender for Cloud.
columns.Name: GcpFullResourceName

columns.Description: An identifier for the account as found by Microsoft Defender for Cloud. Could be Microsoft Entra ID, user principal name, IaM role or other identifiers
columns.Name: Account

columns.Description: The client IP address used to access the cloud resource or control plane
columns.Name: IPAddress

columns.Description: Indicates whether the IP address belongs to a known anonymous proxy
columns.Name: IsAnonymousProxy

columns.Description: Two-letter code indicating the country where the client IP address is geolocated
columns.Name: CountryCode

columns.Description: City where the client IP address is geolocated
columns.Name: City

columns.Description: Internet service provider associated with  the IP address
columns.Name: ISP

columns.Description: User agent information from the web browser or other client application
columns.Name: UserAgent

columns.Description: Raw event information from the source application or service in JSON format
columns.Name: RawEventData

columns.Description: Additional information about the entity or event
columns.Name: AdditionalFields
